title: Tyler, the Creator Unveils 2024 Camp Flog Gnaw Carnival Lineup
description: Playboi Carti, Erykah Badu, Earl Sweatshirt, André 3000, and more will play the Los Angeles festival in November
author: Matthew Strauss
excerpt: Playboi Carti, Erykah Badu, Earl Sweatshirt, André 3000, and more will play the Los Angeles festival in November
text: The 10th edition of the Camp Flog Gnaw Carnival takes place in November. Today, Tyler, the Creator has unveiled the festival’s lineup. As usual, Tyler will be perform, and he’ll be joined by Playboi Carti, Erykah Badu, André 3000, Faye Webster, Blood Orange, Sampha, Sexyy Red, Denzel Curry, Yves Tumor, Doechii, Tommy Richman, Syd, Left Brain, Mike G, Earl Sweatshirt, Kaytranada, Schoolboy Q, Omar Apollo, and more. See the full lineup and the event’s poster below.It’s been a busy week for Tyler, the Creator, as he shared a new video and announced that his new album, Chromakopia, is out October 28. The full-length will follow Call Me If You Get Lost and The Estate Sale.Camp Flog Gnaw Carnival takes place at Los Angeles’ Dodger Stadium on Saturday, November 16, and Sunday, November 17. The festival’s 2023 edition featured the Hillbillies, SZA, Kali Uchis, Ravyn Lenae, and many others.Revisit “Why Tyler, the Creator’s Camp Flog Gnaw is a Testament to Odd Future’s Influence” on the Pitch.Camp Flog Gnaw Carnival 2024Action BronsonAndré 3000The Alchemist & FriendsAmelia MooreBlood OrangeConcrete BoysDaniel CaesarDenzel CurryDoechiiDomo GenesisEarl SweatshirtErykah BaduFaye WebsterFM Mood: A Tribute to MF DoomHana VuJean DawsonJordan WardKaytranadaKenny MasonLaila!Latin MafiaLeft BrainLitheMa$eThe MainlinersThe MaríasMatt ChampionMike GMustard & FriendsNa-Kel SmithOmar ApolloOrion SunPlayboi CartiRayeRio AmorSamphaSchoolboy QSexyy RedSydTommy RichmanTyler, the CreatorVince StaplesWispYves Tumor
html:
The 10th edition of the Camp Flog Gnaw Carnival takes place in November. Today, Tyler, the Creator has unveiled the festival’s lineup. As usual, Tyler will be perform, and he’ll be joined by Playboi Carti, Erykah Badu, André 3000, Faye Webster, Blood Orange, Sampha, Sexyy Red, Denzel Curry, Yves Tumor, Doechii, Tommy Richman, Syd, Left Brain, Mike G, Earl Sweatshirt, Kaytranada, Schoolboy Q, Omar Apollo, and more. See the full lineup and the event’s poster below.

It’s been a busy week for Tyler, the Creator, as he shared a new video and announced that his new album, Chromakopia, is out October 28. The full-length will follow Call Me If You Get Lost and The Estate Sale.

Camp Flog Gnaw Carnival takes place at Los Angeles’ Dodger Stadium on Saturday, November 16, and Sunday, November 17. The festival’s 2023 edition featured the Hillbillies, SZA, Kali Uchis, Ravyn Lenae, and many others.

Revisit “Why Tyler, the Creator’s Camp Flog Gnaw is a Testament to Odd Future’s Influence” on the Pitch.
